title: Selecting Teleport in the champion select screen disables the whole client
body:
Ever since updating my League of Legends client to Patch 6.1 whenever I would select Teleport as a summoner spell the whole screen would dim, preventing me from doing absolutely everything. I am unable to select a Champion,  Summoner Spell, or Rune / Mastery Page. I can't even select a champion on the side of the screen to view their abilities and lore. 

The only way I have found my way out of this glitch is by selecting the Champion, Runes, and Masteries I want to use, before selecting teleport. However, after the game is finished and I am met with the scoreboard and stuff, I am still unable to select anything. I have to restart the client to get it to function again.


This is super annoying and has costed me a 5 minute probation

{{summoner:12}}
